measure.CatchLine: Establishes temporary limitations on lenders' remedies for borrowers' failures to make payments on obligations secured by mortgages, trust deeds or land sale contracts for certain real property.
measure.MeasureSummary:
Establishes temporary limitations on lenders' remedies for borrowers' failures to make payments on obligations secured by mortgages, trust deeds or land sale contracts for certain real property. 
	Declares emergency, effective on passage.
measure.RelatingToFull: Relating to strategies to protect Oregonians from the effects of the COVID-19 pandemic; and declaring an emergency.
measure.RelatingTo: Relating to strategies to protect Oregonians from the effects of the COVID-19 pandemic; and declaring an emergency.

historyActions.ActionText: First reading. Referred to Speaker's desk.
Recommendation: Do pass with amendments and be printed A-Engrossed.
Minority Recommendation: Do pass with amendments and be printed A-Engrossed.
Motion to substitute Minority Report for Committee Report failed.
historyActions.VoteText: Ayes, 23; Nays, 35--Alonso Leon, Bynum, Campos, Dexter, Evans, Fahey, Gomberg, Grayber, Helm, Holvey, Hudson, Kropf, Lively, Marsh, McLain, Meek, Nathanson, Neron, Nosse, Pham, Power, Prusak, Rayfield, Reynolds, Ruiz, Salinas, Sanchez, Schouten, Smith Warner, Sollman, Speaker Kotek, Valderrama, Wilde, Williams, Witt; Absent, 1--Reardon; Excused, 1--Clem.

historyActions.ActionText: Third reading. Carried by Holvey. Passed.
historyActions.VoteText: Ayes, 38; Nays, 21--Bonham, Boshart Davis, Breese-Iverson, Cate, Drazan, Leif, Levy, Lewis, Moore-Green, Morgan, Nearman, Owens, Post, Reschke, Smith DB, Smith G, Stark, Wallan, Weber, Wright, Zika; Excused, 1--Clem.

historyActions.ActionText: First reading. Referred to President's desk.
Public Hearing and Work Session held.
Recommendation: Do pass with amendments to the A-Eng. bill. (Printed B-Eng.)
Third reading.  Carried by Beyer.  Passed.
historyActions.VoteText: Ayes, 19; Nays, 9--Anderson, Girod, Hansell, Heard, Johnson, Kennemer, Knopp, Linthicum, Thomsen; Excused, 2--Gelser, Thatcher.

historyActions.ActionText: House concurred in Senate amendments and repassed bill.
historyActions.VoteText: Ayes, 36; Nays, 20--Bonham, Boshart Davis, Breese-Iverson, Cate, Drazan, Leif, Levy, Lewis, Moore-Green, Morgan, Nearman, Owens, Post, Reschke, Smith DB, Stark, Wallan, Weber, Wright, Zika; Excused, 4--Evans, Helm, Sanchez, Smith G.
